title: Poweramp Music Player (Full) v2.0.10-build-565 APK (Android)
description:
2.0 is the next major release and a free update for everyone, who purchased PowerAMP Full Version Unlocker.
IMPORTANT: PowerAMP v2.0 has completely independent Library implementation. Please ensure you have all your Music Folders checked in PowerAMP Settings => Music Folders to have all your songs in the Library.

Features:
plays mp3, mp4/m4a (including alac), ogg, wma*, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mpc, aiff (* some wma pro files may require NEON support) 
10 band optimized graphical equalizer for all supported formats, presets, custom presets 
separate Bass and Treble adjustment 
stereo eXpansion, mono mixing, balance 
crossfade 
gapless 
replay gain 
plays songs from folders and from own library 
dynamic queue 
lyrics support, including lyrics search via musiXmatch plugin 
embed and standalone .cue files support 
support for m3u, m3u8, pls, wpl playlists 
OpenGL based cover art animation 
downloads missing album art 
4 configurable widget types 
configurable lock screen with optional Direct Unlock 
headset support, automatic Resume on headset and/or BT connection (can be disabled in settings) 
scrobbling 
tag editor 
visual themes, including support for external/3rd party skins 
fast library scan 
high level of customization via settings 
Changelog (v1.4 => v2.0) :

Audio Engine: 
Direct Volume Control for new Android 2.3+ sound system where available. Direct Volume Control results in volume level equal (or higher with positive preamp) to stock player, but with the Equalizer/Tone enabled 
re-tuned equalizer/tone controls for Direct Volume Control (gives a larger range of distortion-free sound, deeper basses) 
output limiter. Ensures distortion-free sound even on extreme equalizer/tone amplification levels 
.mpc, .aiff 
replay gain support for all supported formats which support Replay Gain (mp3, mp4/m4a, flac, ape, wv, tta, ogg, mpc) 
Stereo X expansion effect 
mix-to-mono, balance 

Library/Folders: 
custom complete Library/Media Scanner implementation, 10x-100x scan speed comparing to system library tag scanner 
Music Folder hierarchical selection 
permanent shuffle. Shuffle session is stored in database and survives PowerAMP restart, phone reboots etc. 
Menu => List Opts for almost each Folder/Library list with the sorting, view mode, and other per-list options 
playlist unification, no more Folders vs Library playlists 
m3u/m3u8, pls, wpl playlist file formats support 
playlist export from system Library 
embed cue support (flac, wv, ape) 
full-library and folders search 
history of songs played and other smart playlists (Most Played, Top Rated, Recently Played, Recently Added. Each list can be set to be sorted in Reverse. Enable these lists via Menu => Lists Opts in Library) 
rating system. PowerAMP 2.0 stores ratings in own database only 
auto-advance options moved from Settings to Advance List repeat mode 
new Shuffle modes: shuffle songs then lists; shuffle lists, songs in order 
home screen playlist shortcut support 
voice search support ("Listen to") 
UI: 
restyled skins (larger controls, less controls initially visible, expandable menus, bigger album art, etc.) 
ability to load skins from Market/apk/jar files 
OpenGL cover animation 
grid view for folders/albums lists 
new Equalizer/Tone and Library layouts 
new configurable Lock Screen 
new configurable 4x4, 4x2, 4x1, and 2x2 widgets 
improved Settings layout and reorganized options 
Other:
lyrics download (via separate musiXmatch plugin)
more than 100 changes in total and more are coming in the next PowerAMP 2.x releases!
What's in this version: (Updated : Nov 17, 2014)
optimizations for large number of albums/folders in Albums/Folders lists and grids
improved image caching for the scrolling buttery in Albums/Folders lists (Android 4+, 3rd party skins may vary)
Music Folders selection dialog revamp/optimization for large storages
filter support for View As Grid
fixed crash for large number of albums with images for some CM variants
Poweramp doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t create .pamp files (folder thumbnails) anymore
better support for skins on Lollipop (skin updates may be required)
fixed/polished things for Lollipop in various areas
skinned dialogs now order buttons according to default platform order
few other fixes and small improvements
Required Android O/S : 2.1+


Instructions:
Install PowerAMP APK
Install PowerAMP Unlocker APK
Run PowerAMP then force close (Use TB / app manager)
Run lucky patcher > Custom patch by SanX
If not full, patch again and reboot
